# Marc Garrido Casas - Portfolio
Embedded Software & Firmware Engineer specializing in High Performance Computing (HPC) and modern C++.

## About
- Eight years of experience in Low-level programming, Real-time systems, and software efficiency.
- Expertise: Modern C++ (C++17/20), C, Python, and Golang.
- Education: Informatics Engineering (UPC), Masterâ€™s in Data Science (UOC).

## Experience
- **DeepDetection (2023-2025):** Senior Embedded Software Engineer. Optimized X-ray cameras using C++20.
- **Ficosa (2022-2023):** Senior Embedded Software Engineer. ADAS Automotive and Bootloader development (AUTOSAR).
- **Derivco Sports (2021-2023):** Backend Software Engineer. Golang refactoring and DevOps.
- **HP (2019-2021):** Firmware Engineer. Real-time servo movement and printing speed optimization.
- **Promax Electronics (2019):** Firmware Engineer. FM decoder implementation.
- **Rearsim (2017-2019):** Computer Engineer. Motorcycle simulator control systems.

## Projects
- **Dofus3Click:** Autonomous bot for online games (Telemetry & Pathfinding).
- **Web Scraping & Stats:** Automated ticket booking and sports data processing.
- **Arduino Projects:** Parking sensors, alcoholimeters, and mechanical automation.
- **Airport Management:** C++ program using heuristics for logistics.
